overview: Charming, sexy, and hung like a horse, Italian porn legend Rocco Siffredi doesn't need an fancy set or even a camera crew to audition exciting, new sluts. In "Rocco's POV 18," the iconic director invites 6 sexy young hopefuls to his private office for the kind of intimate, nasty scenes that can only be shot raw, up close and personal.
title: Rocco's POV 18
